name: Severely_Obese_Adults_2018_Norwegian_Cohort
title: StudyGroup: Severely Obese Adults 2018 Norwegian Cohort
description: Cohort study with baseline data of exposures from November 2005 through July 2010 and follow-up data from 2006 until death or through December 2015 at a tertiary care outpatient center, Vestfold Hospital Trust, Norway. Consecutive treatment-seeking adult patients (n = 2109) with severe obesity assessed (221 patients excluded and 1888 patients included).

characteristic.description: enrolled in registry-based cohort study conducted at Vestfold Hospital Trust, Norway November 2005 through July 2010

valueCodeableConcept.text: registry-based cohort study conducted at Vestfold Hospital Trust, Norway

characteristic.description: severe obesity (BMI at least 40 or at least 35 with at least 1 obesity-related comorbidity)
